item.title: George Lucas and the Making of ‘Star Wars’ Get the Graphic Novel Treatment with ‘Lucas Wars’ (First Look)
item.description: The tome, originally published in France, tells the decade-long story of Lucas’ magnum opus.

item.title: Darth Vader’s Lightsaber Auction Sale Sets Record for ‘Star Wars’ Item
item.description: The coveted prop was used in ‘The Empire Strikes Back’ and ‘Return of the Jedi’ and represented a rare opportunity for collectors.
